Class KivaMoveTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • KivaMoveTest

  • public class KivaMoveTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Various Kiva move tests

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the tests in this class.

      • setTestMode

        public void setTestMode(boolean testMode)
        Changes whether test outputs verifyKivaState after every KivaCommand to console
        Parameters:
        testMode - boolean true: verifies kiva state after each KivaCommand, false: skips verification until set to true.

      • testDrop

        public void testDrop()
        Allows the Kiva to DROP a pod. If the Kiva is not carrying a pod, it TAKEs one first.

      • testDropOnDropZone

        public void testDropOnDropZone()
        Tests DROP on drop zone using default map (10,4). Assumes start at default map pod location (8,1).

      • testForward

        public void testForward()
        Moves the Kiva FORWARD once.

      • testForward

        public void testForward(int times)
        Moves the Kiva object FORWARD the amount of times given in the times parameter. Runs a test at each FORWARD movement.
        Parameters:
        times - number of times to move the Kiva forward, integer.
        See Also:
        KivaCommand, Example Usage: KivaTest testKiva = new KivaTest(); testKiva.testForward(3);

      • testForwardFromDown

        public void testForwardFromDown()
        Faces the Kiva DOWN and moves it FORWARD once.

      • testForwardFromLeft

        public void testForwardFromLeft()
        Faces the Kiva LEFT and moves it FORWARD once.

      • testForwardFromRight

        public void testForwardFromRight()
        Faces the Kiva DOWN and moves it FORWARD once.

      • testForwardFromUp

        public void testForwardFromUp()
        Faces the Kiva UP and moves it FORWARD once.

      • testIllegalDropZone

        public void testIllegalDropZone()
        Tests for exception if Kiva attempts to DROP a POD outside the DROP_ZONE.

      • testKivaMotorLifetime

        public void testKivaMotorLifetime()

      • testKivaTakeDrop

        public void testKivaTakeDrop(KivaMoveTest kivaMoveTest)
        Tests a Kiva during a successful move, take, move, ad drop run
        Parameters:
        kivaMoveTest - Dummy object to access from static runner classes

      • testMoveIntoObstacle

        public void testMoveIntoObstacle()
        Tests for exception if Kiva runs into a FloorMapObject.OBSTACLE

      • testMoveOutOfBounds

        public void testMoveOutOfBounds()
        Tests for exception if Kiva moves off defined FloorMap

      • testNoPodAtLocation

        public void testNoPodAtLocation()
        Tests for exception if Kiva attempts to TAKE a POD at an empty location.

      • testPodCollision

        public void testPodCollision()
        Tests for exception if Kiva carrying a POD collides with another POD.

      • testTake

        public void testTake()
        Allows the Kiva to TAKE a pod.

      • testTakeOnPod

        public void testTakeOnPod()
        Tests TAKE at pod location using default map (8,1). Assumes start at default map start location (2,4).

      • testTurnLeft

        public void testTurnLeft()
        TURNs the Kiva LEFT once.

      • testTurnLeft

        public void testTurnLeft(int times)
        TURNs the Kiva object LEFT the amount of times given in the times parameter. Runs a test at each TURN_LEFT.
        Parameters:
        times - number of times to turn the Kiva left, integer.
        See Also:
        KivaCommand, Example Usage: KivaTest testKiva = new KivaTest(); testKiva.testTurnLeft(3);

      • testTurnLeftFromDown

        public void testTurnLeftFromDown()
        Faces the Kiva DOWN and TURNs it LEFT once.

      • testTurnLeftFromLeft

        public void testTurnLeftFromLeft()
        Faces the Kiva LEFT and TURNs it LEFT once.

      • testTurnLeftFromRight

        public void testTurnLeftFromRight()
        Faces the Kiva RIGHT and TURNs it LEFT once.

      • testTurnLeftFromUP

        public void testTurnLeftFromUP()
        Faces the Kiva UP and TURNs it LEFT once.

      • testTurnRight

        public void testTurnRight()
        TURNs the Kiva RIGHT once.

      • testTurnRight

        public void testTurnRight(int times)
        TURNs the Kiva object RIGHT the amount of times given in the times parameter. Runs a test at each TURN_RIGHT.
        Parameters:
        times - number of times to turn the Kiva right, integer. Example Usage: KivaTest testKiva = new KivaTest(); testKiva.testRight(3);

      • testTurnRightFromDown

        public void testTurnRightFromDown()
        Faces the Kiva DOWN and TURNs it RIGHT once.

      • testTurnRightFromLeft

        public void testTurnRightFromLeft()
        Faces the Kiva LEFT and TURNs it RIGHT once.

      • testTurnRightFromRight

        public void testTurnRightFromRight()
        Faces the Kiva RIGHT and TURNs it RIGHT once.

      • testTurnRightFromUP

        public void testTurnRightFromUP()
        Faces the Kiva UP and TURNs it RIGHT once.

      • verifyKivaState

        void verifyKivaState()
        Displays the current Kiva state on the console. This can not be used as a verification test, all tests will pass with SUCCESS.
